meanings.definition: A person with a face resembling that of a dog.
meanings.sent1: The little girl had a cute dogface with floppy ears and a wet nose.
meanings.sent2: I saw a man at the park with a dogface, and he was petting a real dog!
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, Sarah wore a mask with a dogface and barked at everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room, making her dogface seem more friendly than ever.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a portrait of a woman with a dogface, capturing every detail perfectly.

meanings.definition: A butterfly with markings resembling a dog's face.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, I spotted a beautiful butterfly with a dogface fluttering around.
meanings.sent2: The children were amazed by the butterfly's dogface as it landed on a flower.
meanings.sent3: The dogface butterfly seemed to wink at me as if it knew a secret.
meanings.sent4: The delicate wings of the dogface butterfly looked like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: I marveled at the intricate patterns on the wings of the dogface butterfly.

meanings.sent1: The brave dogface marched through the muddy battlefield with determination.
meanings.sent2: The dogface stood guard at the entrance, ready to defend against any threat.
meanings.sent3: The dogface tripped over his own boots during training, much to the amusement of his comrades.
meanings.sent4: In the heat of battle, the dogface never wavered, earning the respect of his fellow soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The dogface's helmet gleamed under the sun as he advanced towards the enemy lines.
